text:
Hi Jasmeet, sorry for the late reply, it's been a manic week. Great to connect with you!
Thanks for letting me know a bit about your background. That's very useful.

I work as a designer, so I certainly can help you with improving your design work. Maybe less so with helping with Maya or zbrush as I don't use them myself.

I'd love to take a look at your portfolio and we can take it from there.

Looking forward to it.
